titles.title: Advancing Affordable Medicines for Families Act
Advancing Affordable Medicines for Families Act
A bill to require the Government Accountability Office to issue a report on nonprofit pharmaceutical organizations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Advancing Affordable Medicines for Families Act
This bill requires the Government Accountability Office to report on the potential impact of nonprofit pharmaceutical organizations on the availability and cost of drugs as well as such organizations' potential to accelerate development of new drugs, generic drugs, new biological products, biosimilar products, cell-based therapies, and medical devices.
